column2: Position Title: Senior Political Consultant Location: Punjab, India Reports to: Campaign Manager/Political Party Leadership Position Summary: The Senior Political Consultant will leverage extensive experience to lead and execute sophisticated political campaigns in Punjab. Develop high-impact press releases, speeches, and media content tailored to the electorate of Punjab. Monitor competitor strategies and political trends to proactively address challenges and opportunities. Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.
